Most people think of MercadoLibre as Latin America's Amazon. But 74% of Mercado Pago's $197B in total payment volume now happens off the marketplace entirely.

The payments business broke free. It's processing transactions at corner stores, gas stations, and online merchants that have nothing to do with the marketplace.

Meanwhile, commerce take rate expanded from ~16% to ~20% over five years ‚Äî revenue grew 37.5% last year while GMV grew only 15%. Every layer they add (ads, logistics, credit) extracts more from each transaction.

$MELI isn't an e-commerce company with a payments feature. It's a financial infrastructure company with an e-commerce feature.
